title: Google Classroom ‘practice sets’ will give students real-time help as part of ‘adaptive learning’ push
content:
Google wants to leverage AI to help kids get a more “personal learning experience.” In the coming months, Google Classroom is getting a “practice sets” feature that surfaces assistance and other suggestions as students do the work.

more…

The post Google Classroom ‘practice sets’ will give students real-time help as part of ‘adaptive learning’ push appeared first on 9to5Google.
